PackageFile.description: The relevant bits of a parsed package.json file.

PackageFileRepository.description: Represents the repository field in package.json.

description: Options that can be given on the CLI or passed to the ncu module to control all behavior.

cache.description: Cache versions to a local cache file. Default `--cacheFile` is ~/.ncu-cache.json and default `--cacheExpiration` is 10 minutes.

cacheClear.description: Clear the default cache, or the cache file specified by `--cacheFile`.

cacheExpiration.description: Cache expiration in minutes. Only works with `--cache`.

cacheFile.description: Filepath for the cache file. Only works with `--cache`.

concurrency.description: Max number of concurrent HTTP requests to registry.

configFilePath.description: Directory of .ncurc config file. (default: directory of `packageFile`)

cwd.description: Working directory in which npm will be executed.

deep.description: Run recursively in current working directory. Alias of (`--packageFile '**\/package.json'`).

dep.description: Check one or more sections of dependencies only: dev, optional, peer, prod, or packageManager (comma-delimited).

doctor.description: Iteratively installs upgrades and runs tests to identify breaking upgrades. Requires `-u` to execute. Run "ncu --help --doctor" for details.

doctorInstall.description: Specifies the install script to use in doctor mode. (default: `npm install/yarn`)

doctorTest.description: Specifies the test script to use in doctor mode. (default: `npm test`)

enginesNode.description: Include only packages that satisfy engines.node as specified in the package file.

errorLevel.description: Set the error level. 1: exits with error code 0 if no errors occur. 2: exits with error code 0 if no packages need updating (useful for continuous integration).

anyOf.description: Supported function for the --filter and --reject options.

filter.description: Include only package names matching the given string, wildcard, glob, comma-or-space-delimited list, /regex/, or predicate function.

filterResults.description: Filters out upgrades based on a user provided function. Run "ncu --help --filterResults" for details.

anyOf.description: Supported function for the --filter and --reject options.

filterVersion.description: Filter on package version using comma-or-space-delimited list, /regex/, or predicate function.

format.description: Modify the output formatting or show additional information. Specify one or more comma-delimited values: group, ownerChanged, repo, time, lines. Run "ncu --help --format" for details.

global.description: Check global packages instead of in the current project.

interactive.description: Enable interactive prompts for each dependency; implies `-u` unless one of the json options are set.

jsonAll.description: Output new package file instead of human-readable message.

jsonDeps.description: Like `jsonAll` but only lists `dependencies`, `devDependencies`, `optionalDependencies`, etc of the new package data.

loglevel.description: Amount to log: silent, error, minimal, warn, info, verbose, silly.

mergeConfig.description: Merges nested configs with the root config file for `--deep` or `--packageFile` options. (default: false)

minimal.description: Do not upgrade newer versions that are already satisfied by the version range according to semver.

packageData.description: Package file data (you can also use stdin).

packageManager.description: npm, yarn, pnpm, deno, bun, staticRegistry (default: npm). Run "ncu --help --packageManager" for details.

peer.description: Check peer dependencies of installed packages and filter updates to compatible versions. Run "ncu --help --peer" for details.

pre.description: Include prerelease versions, e.g. -alpha.0, -beta.5, -rc.2. Automatically set to 1 when `--target` is newest or greatest, or when the current version is a prerelease. (default: 0)

registry.description: Third-party npm registry. Run "ncu --help --registry" for details.

anyOf.description: Supported function for the --filter and --reject options.

reject.description: Exclude packages matching the given string, wildcard, glob, comma-or-space-delimited list, /regex/, or predicate function.

anyOf.description: Supported function for the --filter and --reject options.

rejectVersion.description: Exclude package.json versions using comma-or-space-delimited list, /regex/, or predicate function.

removeRange.description: Remove version ranges from the final package version.

retry.description: Number of times to retry failed requests for package info.

root.description: Runs updates on the root project in addition to specified workspaces. Only allowed with `--workspace` or `--workspaces`. (default: false)

silent.description: Don't output anything. Alias for `--loglevel` silent.

anyOf.description: A function that can be provided to the --target option for custom filtering.

target.description: Determines the version to upgrade to: latest, newest, greatest, minor, patch, @[tag], or [function]. (default: latest) Run "ncu --help --target" for details.

timeout.description: Global timeout in milliseconds. (default: no global timeout and 30 seconds per npm-registry-fetch)

upgrade.description: Overwrite package file with upgraded versions instead of just outputting to console.

verbose.description: Log additional information for debugging. Alias for `--loglevel` verbose.

workspace.description: Run on one or more specified workspaces. Add `--root` to also upgrade the root project.

workspaces.description: Run on all workspaces. Add `--root` to also upgrade the root project.
